title: drc-test
author: Pokes303
details:
A WiiU homebrew/app for testing the DRC and read/write some hidden values

Features for testing

Buttons/Joysticks
Screen/Touchscreen
Gyroscope
Accelerometer
Direction
Angle
Magnetometer
Volume
Battery
Vibration
Gamepad Sensor Bar
Gamepad BASE
changelog: -Fixed a bug where length can be >255 and results on parsing error\n-Fixed texts\n-Fixed exit to Home Menu from Channel version
